title: Gas Pipeline Security upgrade.
description: US pipeline control security is needy, and in need of upgrading. The Colonial pipeline hack prompted a state of emergency by the President.
solution: I propose a feasibility study that would explore how Cardano's blockchain tools might be implemented into the industries existing controls.
experience: I am a long-term QA inspector in US oil and gas industry. I have worked for the "major" oil and gas companies and have a unique perspective.
